summary: Completely overhauls the dull exterior of the College of Winterhold in a lovely lore-friendly way.  Cleaned and optimized with TESVEdit and is script free.  Indulge in the magic...
descriptionHtml:
This mod alters and enhances the exterior of the College of Winterhold in a very lore-friendly.  Many things have changed to make the college more aesthetically pleasing.  I made this mod because I was tired of how drab the exterior looked.  The college did not properly display that it is on top of a huge mountain in the tundra and that it is a MAGIC (arcane arts) college.  There is so much packed in, it hard to put it all in a few pictures. 

[center]It was in desperate need of a make-over to make it look more magical.

[img]http://i62.tinypic.com/11qu7ox.jpg[/img][/center][b][i][u]Info:
[/u][/i][/b]V1.1 (initial release)
- Fixed various vanilla navmesh issues.
- Added more objects and cleaned up.
- Cleaned and optimized with TESVEdit.

- I would recommend the[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/58103/?][color=#6d9eeb][size=3][b]EWIs Enhanced College of Winterhold[/b][/size][/color][/url] texture mod to give the college an even better look.  I am also using [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/30554/?][color=#0563c1][b][size=3][color=#6d9eeb]Winterhold - [/color][color=#6d9eeb]Expanded Ruins[/color][/size][/b][/color][/url] :)

[center][img]http://i59.tinypic.com/2rlzqxd.jpg[/img][/center][center]photo creds - [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/4425231]ewi65[/url] [/center]

- This mod  does not touch the interior of the College.  Another update/mod may include the interior though :) 

[center][img]http://i59.tinypic.com/2dsfwuv.jpg[/img][/center]

Please leave suggestions if you could think of ways to make this mod even better :)

[b][i][u]Compatibility:[/u][/i][/b] 
- Compatible with all mods that do not effect the exterior of the College and the Bridge that leads to it.

[u][i][b]Requirements:[/b][/i][/u]
- Latest version of Skyrim.

[u][i][b]Installation:[/b][/i][/u] 
Use nexus or manually drop the .esp file into your "Data" folder.
[b] [/b]
[u][i][b]Known Issue(s):[/b][/i][/u]
- There are no known issues with this mod.
- Probable small drop in frame-rate.

[center][img]http://i57.tinypic.com/2lu4fib.jpg[/img][/center]
[b][i][u]Uninstallation:[/u][/i][/b]
AAAWWWWW....if you have to, just simply remove the .esp file from the "Data" folder or uninstall with nexus.


[size=3][size=2][color=#00ff00]And, as always, thank you for looking/downloading...  If you like my work, please remember to check out some of my other mods[/color] [size=2] [/size][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/8497898/?tb=mods&pUp=1][size=4][b]Here[/b][/size][/url][size=2] [/size] :)[/size][/size]
author: typhloman
